text: Roman Sergeevich Madyanov (; 22 July 1962 â€“ 25 September 2024) was a Soviet and Russian actor. His career began as a child actor in 1972 when he starred as Huckleberry Finn in Hopelessly Lost (1973). He was best known for playing Mayor Vadim in the 2014 movie Leviathan. Madyanov was born in Dedovsk, then- Soviet Union.
